mapper.insert:
insert into orders(numberstatususer_idaddress_book_idorder_timecheckout_timepay_methodpay_statusamountremarkphoneaddressuser_nameconsigneecancel_reasonrejection_reasoncancel_timeestimated_delivery_timedelivery_statusdelivery_timepack_amounttableware_numbertableware_status) values
(#{entity.number}#{entity.status}#{entity.userId}#{entity.addressBookId}#{entity.orderTime}#{entity.checkoutTime}#{entity.payMethod}#{entity.payStatus}#{entity.amount}#{entity.remark}#{entity.phone}#{entity.address}#{entity.userName}#{entity.consignee}#{entity.cancelReason}#{entity.rejectionReason}#{entity.cancelTime}#{entity.estimatedDeliveryTime}#{entity.deliveryStatus}#{entity.deliveryTime}#{entity.packAmount}#{entity.tablewareNumber}#{entity.tablewareStatus})
on duplicate key update number = values(number)status = values(status)user_id = values(user_id)address_book_id = values(address_book_id)order_time = values(order_time)checkout_time = values(checkout_time)pay_method = values(pay_method)pay_status = values(pay_status)amount = values(amount)remark = values(remark)phone = values(phone)address = values(address)user_name = values(user_name)consignee = values(consignee)cancel_reason = values(cancel_reason)rejection_reason = values(rejection_reason)cancel_time = values(cancel_time)estimated_delivery_time = values(estimated_delivery_time)delivery_status = values(delivery_status)delivery_time = values(delivery_time)pack_amount = values(pack_amount)tableware_number = values(tableware_number)tableware_status = values(tableware_status)
mapper.update:
update orders
number = #{number},
status = #{status},
user_id = #{userId},
address_book_id = #{addressBookId},
order_time = #{orderTime},
checkout_time = #{checkoutTime},
pay_method = #{payMethod},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
amount = #{amount},
remark = #{remark},
phone = #{phone},
address = #{address},
user_name = #{userName},
consignee = #{consignee},
cancel_reason = #{cancelReason},
rejection_reason = #{rejectionReason},
cancel_time = #{cancelTime},
estimated_delivery_time = #{estimatedDeliveryTime},
delivery_status = #{deliveryStatus},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime},
pack_amount = #{packAmount},
tableware_number = #{tablewareNumber},
tableware_status = #{tablewareStatus},
where id = #{id}
